typeSystemDescription.name: JWPL-specific types
typeSystemDescription.vendor: Ubiquitous Knowledge Processing (UKP) Lab, Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt

typeDescription.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.io.jwpl.type.DBConfig
typeDescription.description: Database configuration for the connection to the database where the CAS data was retrieved.

typeDescription.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.io.jwpl.type.ArticleInfo
typeDescription.description: Contains basic information about the article.

featureDescription.name: Authors
featureDescription.description: Number of unique authors of this article

featureDescription.name: Revisions
featureDescription.description: Number of revisions of this article.

featureDescription.name: FirstAppearance
featureDescription.description: The Timestamp of the first appearance of this article.

featureDescription.name: LastAppearance
featureDescription.description: The Timestamp of the last appearance of this article.

featureDescription.name: pageId
featureDescription.description: The pageId of the Wikipedia page of this revision.

featureDescription.name: contributorName
featureDescription.description: The username of the user/contributor who edited this revision.

featureDescription.name: comment
featureDescription.description: The comment that the editor entered for this revision.

featureDescription.name: contributorId
featureDescription.description: The userId of the user/contributor who created this revision

featureDescription.name: timestamp
featureDescription.description: The timestamp of the revision, given in milliseconds since the standard base time (January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT)
